events.title: National Programming Contest 2026
events.description: Annual inter-university programming contest organized by CSE Department. Teams from various universities across Bangladesh will participate.

events.title: AI & ML Workshop
events.description: 3-day intensive workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with hands-on projects and industry expert sessions.

events.title: Tech Talk: Career in Tech Industry
events.description: Industry professionals sharing insights about career opportunities in tech sector and tips for students.

events.title: CSE Freshers' Welcome
events.description: Welcome ceremony for new students of CSE Department with cultural programs and orientation sessions.
